body.name: Acer Vero CB242Y D3bmiprcx 23.8" FHD 1920x1080 Zero Frame IPS Home Office Computer Monitor | 100Hz | 99% sRGB | FHD Webcam | Height Adjustable Stand - Swivel, Tilt & Pivot | Display Port, HDMI & VGA
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 33 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: EPEAT products are assessed against criteria including energy use and have a reduced sustainability impact across their lifecycle. GOLD

features: Incredible Images: The Acer Vero CB242Y 23.8" monitor with 1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution in a 16:9 aspect ratio presents stunning, high-quality images with excellent detail. The zero-frame design provides maximum visibility of the screen from edge-to-edge.

AMD FreeSync Technology: Say “goodbye” to stuttering and tearing. With AMD FreeSync, the monitor’s frames are synced with the graphics card’s frames, which eliminates screen tearing and provide the smoothest gaming experience.

Elevate Your Video Calls: Upgrade your web conferencing experience with this monitor's adjustable FHD webcam. Ensure you always look your best during virtual meetings, thanks to its flexibility and high-definition video quality.

Caring for Your Eyes: Give your eyes a break with Acer VisionCare 2.0. This monitor comes Eyesafe 2.0 certified and is equipped with BlueLightShield Pro, helping to reduce eye strain, filter harmful blue light, and provide a more comfortable viewing experience.

Responsive!!: Fast response time of 1ms enhanced gamers’ in-game experience. No matter the fast-moving action or any dramatic transitions will be all rendered smoothly without the annoying effects of smearing or ghosting. The 100Hz refresh rate speeds up the frames per second to deliver smooth 2D motion scenes.

ErgoStand: Acer Vero CB242Y has an ergonomically designed stand with -5° to 35° tilt, +/-178° swivel, +/-90° pivot and a 6.5" height adjustment so you can always find that ideal viewing position. A quick-release design lets you separate the monitor from its stand so it can be VESA wall-mounted.
23.8" Full HD (1920 x 1080) Widescreen IPS Monitor | AMD FreeSync Technology
Refresh Rate: 100Hz | Response Time: 1ms VRB | Brightness: 250 nits | Pixel Pitch: 0.275mm
Made with 85% PCR, 5% Ocean-bound Plastics & 100% Recyclable Packaging | Zero-Frame Design | Color Saturation: 99% sRGB | 2 speakers, 2 watts per speaker
Ports: 1 x Display Port 1.2, 1 x HDMI 1.4, 1 x VGA, 1 x USB 2.0 Port (Used for Webcam), 1 x Audio-in & 1 x Audio-out (HDMI & USB Cable Included)
body.description: With FHD resolution, IPS wide viewing angle, FHD Websam and 100Hz flicker-free technology, the Vero CB2 series is perfect for the office. The ErgoStand allows for flexible adjustments and Acer VisionCare keeps your eyes comfortable even with prolonged usage. (UM.QB2AA.301)
